001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Decorator;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.NeuronFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
009
010import java.util.List;
011
012/**
013 * A specialized {@link Neuron} that remembers the input values
014 * from its most recent activation.
015 * <p>
016 * This class extends the basic neuron by capturing and storing the
017 * raw outputs of its input neurons during the forward pass. The stored
018 * inputs do not affect the computation of the neuron’s output but
019 * provide additional visibility or state for downstream processing,
020 * such as training algorithms, debugging, or interpretability tools.
021 * </p>
022 *
023 * <h2>Behavior</h2>
024 * <ul>
025 *   <li>On {@link #activate()}, performs the standard neuron computation
026 *       (weighted sum + bias → activation function) and also stores a copy
027 *       of the input values provided by connected neurons.</li>
028 *   <li>The stored inputs can be retrieved via {@link #getStoredInput(int)}.</li>
029 * </ul>
030 */
031@Decorator
032public class LastInputStoredNeuron extends Neuron {
033
034    public static LastInputStoredNeuron create(String name, List<? extends Neuron> inputNodes) {
035        return create(name, inputNodes, Activations.linear());
036    }
037
038    public static LastInputStoredNeuron create(String name, List<? extends Neuron> inputNodes, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
039        return new LastInputStoredNeuron(name, inputNodes, new NeuronFunction(LinearCombination.create(inputNodes.size(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT), activationFunction));
040    }
041
042    private final float[] storedInputs;
043
044    /**
045     * Constructs a neuron that stores the inputs from its most recent activation.
046     *
047     * @param name           human-readable identifier
048     * @param inputs         input neurons feeding into this neuron
049     * @param neuronFunction the neuron function to compute a forward signal
050     */
051    public LastInputStoredNeuron(String name, List<? extends Neuron> inputs, NeuronFunction neuronFunction) {
052        super(name, inputs, neuronFunction);
053        storedInputs = new float[inputs == null ? 0 : inputs.size()];
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Activates this neuron by performing the normal weighted sum
058     * and activation function, and additionally storing the raw input
059     * values from connected neurons.
060     */
061    public synchronized void activate() {
062        super.activate();
063        for (int i = 0; i < getInputNodes().size(); i++) {
064            storedInputs[i] = getInputNodes().get(i).getOutput();
065        }
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Returns the input value that was stored for a specific dimension during the
070     * most recent {@link #activate()} call.
071     * <p>
072     * Dimension indexing is 1-based, where {@code d = 1} refers to the first
073     * input neuron, {@code d = 2} to the second, and so on.
074     *
075     * @param d the input dimension index (1-based)
076     * @return the stored input value for the specified dimension
077     */
078    public float getStoredInput(int d) {
079        return storedInputs[d - 1];
080    }
081
082}
